justification: Misreads Team B’s needs: B already has a Tier 1 (though doubtful) and a healthy Tier 2 TE, so no “huge TE need.” Justin Wright is Out and Tier 5 with declining role, not a high-upside fix. B trusts consensus and values SoS; Josh Garcia (Tier 2, friendly playoff schedule) would be valued higher than Baker/Wright. Some nod to A’s floor-seeking, but rationale is vague and inaccurate. Acceptance probability is overstated.
